ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Necro Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually i do have a question, When you say put a point in to each one, i was under the impression that you could only specilaize in one area of spells. As of
ygData.messageBody:
Actually i do have a question, When you say put a point in to each one, i was under the impression that you could only specilaize in one area of spells. As of right now i am at 95 skill level in all my spell disciplines. I still have aprox. 75 "trains" left.  Thanks for taking the time to answer my question. 

Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote:
Hands down I would say alteration.

Most of the spells you need are Alteration based.

Make sure you put a point into each one else the
numbers won't increase.

also, you need to watch them closely since you want
the one to focus on to hit 50 before any other area.

Let me know if you have questions

Rob
--- jstrackeicg <jstrackeicg@...> wrote:
> Greetings all,
> I have a Necro who is about to hit 20 and I will
> have to decide what
> to specilize in.  I would like to ask some of you
> who have more
> insite into what the future will hold for my necro,
> what should I
> specilze in?
>
> Thank you in advance for the great advice you always
> give.
>
> Good luck and good hunting all.
>
>
>
>
